Specimen Type(s): Whole blood specimen spotted on filter paper
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Fluorometer with excitation central wavelength of 355 nm and emission central wavelength of 460 nm
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the PerkinElmer Neonatal Biotinidase Kit for semiquantitative determination of biotinidase activity in dried blood spot specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in screening newborns for biotinidase deficiency by semiquantitative determination of biotinidase activity in blood specimens dried on filter paper.
